info.author: Remi Barraquand
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
===============
Docker Deployer
===============

Docker Deployer is a Fabric_ framework for `Docker Compose`_
applications deployment.

While `Docker Compose`_ is a tool for defining and running complex applications with Docker,
Docker Deployer provides a basic suite of tasks for deploying such applications in various environment
such as CI servers, staging servers, production servers, etc.


Installation
============

To use Docker Deployer you need Fabric_

    pip install fabric
    pip install docker-deployer

You are done !


Contributing
============

Fork it (https://github.com/barraq/docker-deployer.git)
Create your feature branch (git checkout -b my-new-feature)
Commit your changes (git commit -am 'Add some feature')
Push to the branch (git push origin my-new-feature)
Create new Pull Request

.. _Fabric: http://www.fabfile.org/
.. _Docker Compose: https://docs.docker.com/compose/
info.name: docker-deployer
info.summary: A Fabric framework for Docker deployment based on Docker-Compose.

While Docker Compose is a tool for defining and running complex applications with Docker, Docker Deployer provides a basic suite of tasks for deploying such applications in various environment such as CI servers, staging servers, production servers, etc.

Installation

To use Docker Deployer you need Fabric

pip install fabric pip install docker-deployer

You are done !
